TopicTitle: Could I get some help setting up the MKII Cargo Bay?

Articles.Content:
I put down the MKII cockpit, then the cargo bay. I'm trying to set up a docking port inside the cargo bay that will allow me to attach a small probe. I can get Port A attached to the back of the cockpit, but no matter how I wiggle or turn or twist Port B, it will not attach in a manner that allows it to work.

If I could get some help on this, I would appreciate it.

Your description isn't very helpful, but I think your issue might be the second port is trying to surface-attach to the inside of the bay. Hold the MOD (Alt on windows) key to fix that. If that doesn't work, maybe post screenshots of what the issue is?

What you are looking for is the node snap key, by pressing and holding alt you will be only able to attack parts via nodes.

Thats all
Good luck with whatever payload you're putting into orbit, It hasn't been working out too well for me...
